flash.stm32.core

Class CommunicationInterface

  • java.lang.Object
    • flash.stm32.core.CommunicationInterface
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    UARTInterface

    public abstract class CommunicationInterface
extends java.lang.Object

    Base class representing a communication interface for example; serial port.

    • Method Detail

      • open

        public abstract void open(java.lang.String port,
                          com.serialpundit.serial.SerialComManager.BAUDRATE baudRate,
                          com.serialpundit.serial.SerialComManager.DATABITS dataBits,
                          com.serialpundit.serial.SerialComManager.STOPBITS stopBits,
                          com.serialpundit.serial.SerialComManager.PARITY parity,
                          com.serialpundit.serial.SerialComManager.FLOWCONTROL flowCtrl)
                   throws com.serialpundit.core.SerialComException

        Opens and configures serial port as per the given parameters. Although most of the devices uses even parity, few devices may use no parity, therefore proper documents should be referred for such devices. This also sets the minimum timeout to 500 milli seconds for reading data from serial port

        Parameters:
        port - serial port (COMxx/ttyXX) through which stm32 is connected to host computer
        baudRate - rate of signal change used for communication, select as per the crystal connected to stm32 board for minimum baud rate error
        dataBits - number of data bits a serial frame will contain, set to DATABITS.DB_8
        stopBits - number of stop bits a serial frame will contain, set to STOPBITS.SB_1
        parity - parity type for error checking, set to PARITY.P_EVEN
        flowCtrl - set to FLOWCONTROL.NONE as default bootloader does not use flow control
        Throws:
        com.serialpundit.core.SerialComException - if the port is not found, unable to open and configure it

      • close

        public abstract void close()
                    throws com.serialpundit.core.SerialComException

        Closes opened serial port and release resources if any.

        Throws:
        com.serialpundit.core.SerialComException - if port can not be closed for some reason

      • initAndIdentifyDevice

        public abstract Device initAndIdentifyDevice()
                                      throws com.serialpundit.core.SerialComException,
                                             java.util.concurrent.TimeoutException

        Establish communication with bootloader by sending init sequence (0x7F) and identifies the product id of it. Based on the pid obtained creates and instance of Device class which represents connected stm32.

        Throws:
        com.serialpundit.core.SerialComException - if an error happens when communicating through serial port
        java.util.concurrent.TimeoutException - when bootloader sends NACK or timeout happens

      • disconnectFromDevice

        public abstract void disconnectFromDevice()
